title: My Skylar
description: A USA TODAY From New York Times Bestselling author Penelope Ward, comes a friends-to-lovers story of longing, passion, betrayal and redemption...with a twist that will rip your heart out.Skylar was my best friend, but I secretly pined for her. One thing after another kept us apart, and I've spent the last decade in fear of losing her forever.Because of me, she left town. For years, I thought I'd never see her again.But now she's back...and living with him.I don't deserve her after everything I've put her through, but I can't live without her. This is my last chance because she's about to make the biggest mistake of her life. I can see it her she doesn't love him. She still loves me...which is why I have to stop her before it's too late.My Skylar is a STANDALONE story of 99,000 words and is recommended for readers over the age of 18 due to strong language and explicit sexual content.
author: Penelope Ward
